full_text: I don’t understand what the Bradley Beal infatuation is, I really don’t. A great individual scorer who has a cap on team success. Wanting to keep him solely because he’s their safest chance at having talent on the roster seems ass backwards to me.
I’m taking my chances building a contender over being blatantly average because our top player is the safest option for having talent on the roster. https://t.co/OSi670DEZ2
